text: The purpose of this analysis was to systematically investigate the potential effect of IgM - enriched immunoglobulins on the outcomes of ARDS patients requiring ECMO therapy . We analyzed 57 patients ; 28 patients were treated with IgM - enriched IVIG , and 29 patients did not receive IVIG therapy . Of all patients suffering from septic shock , 75 % of the IVIG - treated patients and 55 % of the control patients had severe ARDS of various origins . However , although the IVIG group had a lower PaO 2 / FiO 2 ratio and required longer ventilation support , longer vasopressor therapy , and longer anti - infective therapy and included MRGN - infected patients , outcome parameters such as LOS in the ICU , LOS in the hospital , and mortality were not significantly different between the groups .
